title: Ready For A Change?
posting_body: Make Your New Home at Vista at Trappers Glen
This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 850 Sq.
This peaceful, quiet neighborhood showcases the mountains as your backdrop and a view of stunning Red Rocks to greet you each day.
It’s the ultimate Colorado foothills location while still being conveniently close to Morrison, Littleton and all the conveniences of city life.
Sunsets over the mountains and spectacular views of Colorado’s beauty from your new home making living in these apartments in Morrison, CO almost like being on vacation.
We are nestled in the foothills in the established and desirable Morrison community, away from crowds and traffic.
With quick access to Highway 285 and C470, you can easily head into Littleton or Denver or west to Colorado’s best ski areas.
You’ll find Whole Foods, Costco and Walmart nearby and Southwest Plaza Mall with a multitude of shopping and dining options is just a short commute away.
